local_intent: Approach and align precisely to the bread, then verify position and yaw readiness for grasp.
assumptions: Desired yaw is 90 degrees for the grasp phase
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan around ApproachAndAlign: confirms visibility, aligns with tolerance 0.01 and timeout 1200 ms, then verifies IsAt(bread) and AtOrientation(90) before grasp computation.
